channel.title: iPod Reset Tip
channel.description: I've used my old iPod Mini nearly every day for 2 years (since I discovered Podcasting for the first time).  Tomorrow I have a rather long car journey ahead of me and I have been saving up a few episodes...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by stephen jones+00:00
item.description: thanks for the ipod tip, much apreciated stephen
item.dc:creator: stephen jones

item.title: Comment by Phil+00:00
item.description: Oh if only this really worked :(
item.dc:creator: Phil

item.title: Comment by Martin Woodward+00:00
item.description: Works just fine for me - even worked with my new 30Gb iPod when it froze up on only the second day of use while showing some photos in the photo viewer.
item.dc:creator: Martin Woodward
